casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rudolph COLES, Jr. 417P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 26, 2018

Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Coles, Rudolph (Jr.)

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of November 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of November 2018."
